tr.title: AI SaaS Gen
tr.description: Önyüzü Next.js ve Tailwind CSS, backend tarafı ise FastAPI (Python) ve Supabase kullanılarak geliştirilmiş, Gemini entegreli akıllı chatbot ve SaaS platformu.

en.title: AI SaaS Gen
en.description: A Gemini-integrated smart chatbot and SaaS platform. The frontend is built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, while the backend is powered by FastAPI (Python) and Supabase.
